author: Victor Bergeron A.K.A Trader Vic
description: Trader Vic writes of his drink, "the world's finest, greatest, oh-so good peachy hangover special. This'll do when nothing else will." Perhaps Vic is somewhat overselling this malty banana meal of a drink.
name: Banana Cow
recipeIngredient: 30 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: BLEND all ingredients with 12oz scoop crushed ice and serve with straws
